function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective strategies to minimize the transmission of infectious diseases within Sustainability Rating Systems (SRS)","Impact":"Increased risk of cross-infection and occupational hazards in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Incorporate specific strategies for minimizing the transmission of infectious diseases within SRS","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air purification technologies, and spatial design adjustments","People":"Occupants of indoor environments, workers, and building occupants","Owner":"Developers, building owners, and SRS governing bodies"},{"Description":"Inadequate level of sustainability of strategies addressed in response to the COVID-19 pandemic within Sustainability Rating Systems (SRS)","Impact":"Decreased resilience of indoor spaces to infectious disease transmission and reduced overall sustainability","Mitigation":"Evaluate and update strategies to enhance resilience to infectious diseases within SRS","Technologies":"Innovative building materials, contactless technologies, and enhanced sanitation systems","People":"Occupants of indoor environments, workers, and building occupants","Owner":"Developers, building owners, and SRS governing bodies"},{"Description":"Inadequate hierarchy of infection control in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of infectious disease transmission among occupants","Mitigation":"Implement CDC-recommended hierarchy of infection control measures in indoor environments","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation, air filtration, and germicidal UV systems","People":"Occupants of indoor environments, workers, and building occupants","Owner":"Building managers, employers, and occupational health and safety authorities"}]}
